value_string.String:
commands=(
    "save software from tftp 192.168.1.10 ssg5ssg20.6.1.0r2.0 to flash"
    "unset all | confirm: yes"
    "reset     | confirm: no yes"
    "exit      | confirm: yes"
)

commands=(
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/2"
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/3"
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/4"
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/6"
    "set zone name Internet"
    "set zone name segment1"
    "set zone name segment2"
    "set zone name segment-tftp"
    "set interface eth0/0 zone segment1"
    "set interface eth0/0 ip 10.0.0.1/24"
    "set interface eth0/1 zone segment2"
    "set interface eth0/1 ip 10.0.1.1/24"
    "set interface eth0/6 zone Internet"
    "set interface eth0/6 ip 192.168.200.1/24"
    "set route 0.0.0.0/0 interface eth0/6 gateway 192.168.200.2"
    "set policy from segment1 to Internet any any ANY nat src permit"
    "exit | confirm: yes"
)

templates.name: inst_initial_server_script
tftp_initial_server_script
provisioner_initial_server_script
telnethop_initial_server_script
environment_template
test_runner_script
templates.template_content:
#!/bin/bash

function loadInstanceIDs() {
  echo "declare -A instances"
  terraform show | egrep -o 'openvdc_instance.[^:]+:' | sed -e 's/openvdc_instance.\([^:]*\):/\1/g' | while read instance_name; do
    instance_id=`terraform show | grep -a1 "openvdc_instance.${instance_name}:" | tail -n1 | awk -F"= " '{print $2}'`
    echo "instances[${instance_name}]=${instance_id}"
  done
}

`loadInstanceIDs`

#work_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/network.test"
work_dir="/data/clay_generated_conf"
testcase_dir="${work_dir}/{{.Environment.TestCaseDirectoryName}}"
result_file="${work_dir}/test_result.txt"
log_file="${work_dir}/test_log.txt"

\rm -f ${result_file} ${log_file}

cd ${testcase_dir}

find . -type f -name "*_firewall.sh" | sort  | while read test_script; do
  number="`echo ${test_script} | awk -F_ '{print $1}' | sed -e 's/\.\///g'`"
  client_instance_name="`echo ${test_script} | awk -F_ '{print $2}' | sed -e 's/\.\///g'`"
  client_instance_id="${instances[${client_instance_name}]}"
  server_instance_name="`echo ${test_script} | awk -F_ '{print $4}'`"
  server_instance_id="${instances[${server_instance_name}]}"
  access="`echo ${test_script} | awk -F_ '{print $5}'`"
  if [ "${access}" == "allow" ]; then
    access="Allow"
  else
    access="Deny"
  fi
  protocol="`echo ${test_script} | awk -F_ '{print $6}'`"
  
  prefixResult="${number}_${client_instance_name}_to_${server_instance_name}_${protocol}"
  echo "----- ${test_script} -----" | tee -a ${log_file}

  chmod 755 ${test_script}
  test_script_log="`${test_script}`"
  test_script_result=$?
  echo "${test_script_log}" | tee -a ${log_file}

  if [ ${test_script_result} -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "${prefixResult},${access},NG" | tee -a ${result_file}
  fi
  echo "---------------------" | tee -a ${log_file}
done

templates.name: ssh Firewall TestProgram
templates.template_content:
#!/bin/bash

set -e

function loadInstanceIDs() {
  echo "declare -A instances"
  terraform show | egrep -o 'openvdc_instance.[^:]+:' | sed -e 's/openvdc_instance.\([^:]*\):/\1/g' | while read instance_name; do
    instance_id=`terraform show | grep -a1 "openvdc_instance.${instance_name}:" | tail -n1 | awk -F"= " '{print $2}'`
    echo "instances[${instance_name}]=${instance_id}"
  done
}

`loadInstanceIDs`

client_instance_id="${instances[{{.SourcePort.Node.Name}}]}"
server_instance_id="${instances[{{.DestinationPort.Node.Name}}]}"

openvdc wait ${client_instance_id} running
openvdc wait ${server_instance_id} running

openvdc console ${server_instance_id} <<EOF
service sshd start
EOF

openvdc console ${client_instance_id} <<EOF
nc -v -z -w 1 {{.DestinationPort.Ipv4Address.String}} 22
{{if eq .Access true}}
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  exit 0
else
  exit 1
fi
{{else}}
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  exit 1
else
  exit 0
fi
{{end}}
EOF

http Firewall TestProgram
templates.template_content:
#!/bin/bash

set -e

function loadInstanceIDs() {
  echo "declare -A instances"
  terraform show | egrep -o 'openvdc_instance.[^:]+:' | sed -e 's/openvdc_instance.\([^:]*\):/\1/g' | while read instance_name; do
    instance_id=`terraform show | grep -a1 "openvdc_instance.${instance_name}:" | tail -n1 | awk -F"= " '{print $2}'`
    echo "instances[${instance_name}]=${instance_id}"
  done
}

`loadInstanceIDs`

client_instance_id="${instances[{{.SourcePort.Node.Name}}]}"
server_instance_id="${instances[{{.DestinationPort.Node.Name}}]}"

openvdc wait ${client_instance_id} running
openvdc wait ${server_instance_id} running

openvdc console ${server_instance_id} <<EOF
service httpd start
EOF

openvdc console ${client_instance_id} <<EOF
curl http://{{.DestinationPort.Ipv4Address.String}}/
{{if eq .Access true}}
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  exit 0
else
  exit 1
fi
{{else}}
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  exit 1
else
  exit 0
fi
{{end}}
EOF

templates.name: https Firewall TestProgram
templates.template_content:
#!/bin/bash

set -e

function loadInstanceIDs() {
  echo "declare -A instances"
  terraform show | egrep -o 'openvdc_instance.[^:]+:' | sed -e 's/openvdc_instance.\([^:]*\):/\1/g' | while read instance_name; do
    instance_id=`terraform show | grep -a1 "openvdc_instance.${instance_name}:" | tail -n1 | awk -F"= " '{print $2}'`
    echo "instances[${instance_name}]=${instance_id}"
  done
}

`loadInstanceIDs`

client_instance_id="${instances[{{.SourcePort.Node.Name}}]}"
server_instance_id="${instances[{{.DestinationPort.Node.Name}}]}"

openvdc wait ${client_instance_id} running
openvdc wait ${server_instance_id} running

openvdc console ${server_instance_id} <<EOF
service httpd start
EOF

openvdc console ${client_instance_id} <<EOF
curl --insecure https://{{.DestinationPort.Ipv4Address.String}}/
{{if eq .Access true}}
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  exit 0
else
  exit 1
fi
{{else}}
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  exit 1
else
  exit 0
fi
{{end}}
